bannerContent.mainParagraph: Today Universal Group QSC is a reliable partner of government institutions, oil and gas industry, construction and shipping sectors. Behind the major projects of our 150+ active corporate clients stands our strength, agility and flawless service model.
bannerContent.paragraph1: As Universal Group, we have been operating in the Azerbaijan market since 1998. From the first day, our goal has been to bring the world's leading technologies to our country and strengthen our industry.
bannerContent.paragraph2: After the rebranding we underwent in 2013, we started operating on a larger scale and today we are recognized as a brand that offers not only equipment, but also trust and values.
bannerContent.paragraph3: We currently cooperate with more than 1200 international suppliers and our portfolio includes world-famous brands such as Bosch, Saint Gobain, Klingspor, Telwin, Jotun, ESAB, Lincoln Electric. We deliver our supply processes to production facilities, ports or directly to the field according to our customers' needs.
bannerContent.paragraph4: Today Universal Group QSC is a reliable partner of government institutions, oil and gas industry, construction and shipping sectors. Behind the major projects of our 150+ active corporate clients stands our strength, agility and flawless service model.
bannerContent.mainParagraph1: Founded in 1998 as "Universal Makina," Universal Group began its operations as the official distributor for prestigious brands such as Bosch, Saint Gobain, Klingspor, Telwin, Jotun, ESAB, Çağsan, Lincoln Electric, and Rockwool. In 2013, the company rebranded to "Universal Group" and expanded its operations in the B2B/B2G segments.
bannerContent.mainParagraph2: Today, Universal Group collaborates with over 1,200 international suppliers, offering a wide product portfolio sourced from both domestic and foreign markets—70% from abroad and 30% locally. Depending on project needs, the company delivers products from manufacturing sites, ports, or directly to the job site. The company distinguishes itself with a "flawless service model," taking full responsibility for the entire supply process. We ensure that our customers receive the highest quality products and services, meeting their needs at the highest level.
bannerContent.mainParagraph3: Currently, Universal Group is a trusted partner for over 150 corporate clients in the government, oil and gas, construction, and shipping sectors.
